post.text: Join me in Akron, Ohio - for a few minutes! TOGETHER- WE WILL MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Cheyenne
comment.text: Praying for your safety and that you become our next President

replies.author: Gabrielle
replies.text: We MUST all pray for Donald's safety!!

replies.author: Rhett
replies.text: Don the Con, you are getting on my last nerve

replies.author: John
replies.text: Donald Trump's companies at least $US650 million in debt, York Times reports: "In addition to the $US650 million ($852 million) liabilities, a substantial portion of his wealth is tied up in three passive partnerships that owe an additional $US2 billion to a string of lenders" #SteinBaraka2016
